Name: Bandar Seri Begawan
Description: Bandar Seri Begawan, also known as BSB or just Bandar, is the capital of Brunei.

Name: Bangar
Description: Bangar is the administrative centre of the Temburong District of Brunei. The quiet small town is relatively isolated as Temburong is separated from the main part of the country (where the capital Bandar Seri Begawan is located) by Sarawak's Limbang district.

Name: Kuala Belait
Description: Kuala Belait is the second largest city in Brunei. Kuala Belait lies along the Belait River near the South China Sea, west of Seria. Kuala Belait is a river port at the center of an oil field that includes offshore wells.

Name: Tutong
Description: Tutong is a small town of Tutong District of Brunei. It is located on the banks of Tutong River.

Name: Temburong
Description: Bangar is the administrative centre of the Temburong District of Brunei. The quiet small town is relatively isolated as Temburong is separated from the main part of the country (where the capital Bandar Seri Begawan is located) by Sarawak's Limbang district.
